Job Description: These are core systems development positions where you will own the design and development of significant system software components critical to their industry storage services architected for the cloud.   This is a hands on position where you will be asked to do everything from building rock-solid components to mentoring other engineers.   You need to not only be a top software developer with a good track record of delivering, but also excel in communication, and customer focus. This is a unique and rare opportunity to get in on the ground floor within a fast growing business and help shape the technology, product and the business. A successful candidate will bring deep technical software expertise and ability to work within a fast moving, startup environment in a large company to deliver solid code that has a broad business impact.
